summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KAYICOM Wallet platform focusing on new Haitian Creole features, cross-currency withdrawals, affiliate program, and admin settings. All specified features are working correctly with excellent implementation quality.
passed_tests: Landing page displays in Haitian Creole with all translations (Pòtfèy, Multi-Deviz, Sekirize, etc.)
Language switcher shows KR/FR/EN options and works correctly
Demo user login works perfectly with demo@kayicom.com / Demo1234!
Dashboard shows HTG and USD balances with equivalent values (G 50,000 ≈ $375 USD, $500 ≈ G 66,500 HTG)
Withdraw page shows currency selection with HTG/USD source and target options
Withdraw page has 'Kat / Card' as the first withdrawal method option
Cross-currency withdrawal API endpoint works correctly (returns proper KYC error)
Affiliate page shows referral link with copy functionality
Affiliate page displays 2000 HTG per 5 cards rule clearly (0/5 kat komande = G 2,000)
Admin Settings page has all required API inputs: Resend API, Plisio API, Crisp ID, WhatsApp
All buttons are visible with proper orange/amber colors (#EA580C)
Backend APIs working at 95.2% success rate (20/21 tests passed)
Virtual card endpoints accessible and working
Cross-currency conversion indicators present on withdraw page
Affiliate earnings display and transfer functionality present

success_percentage.backend: 95.2% (20/21 API endpoints working - 1 expected KYC failure)
